channel.title: New Site
channel.description:
Everyone has probably already seen but with the launch of RS3 they've released a new site template, it looks a hell of a lot better and much, much smoother.
Opinions?

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Better than the previous one, but the one before that in 2011 was their best and shortest.

Read full topic

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

There are way more than just a few botters i can tell you that much. Botters will never die.

Read full topic

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The last website was pretty heinous. At least with this one, there’s clearly defined borders and things are spaced out well.

Read full topic

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:27, topic:525882”][quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=644624.msg4338444#msg4338444 date=1374758586]

The website don’t make up for how shitty RS3 is.
[/quote]Shane you need to play it some more and try to learn about the story line. It seems that’s what Jagex is really pushing toward is more story line overall and trying to make an actual story.

I got on for about 2-3 hours last night it was pretty chill I guess. They are combatting bots decently now as well. There are still farmers out there but they will be handled with eventually… (true there will always be botters)

I have not seen any botters since the release of RS3. Not even website spammers either.[/quote]You still get spammed with the website advertisers of course at GE. I have seen a few bots but not that many. They will come again don’t worry.

Read full topic

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

Spades:

The website isn’t smoother. It’s a lot slower than it was before. The game itself lags itself too. And it isn’t my computer. The game was better before, I don’t know why they did all these updates. They are just losing their old players. I don’t see RuneScape living much longer, updates like these are what really kills the game. You don’t need fancy graphics to have a fantastic game, simple is better.

in that case play runescape classic p servers

Read full topic

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

This is really all I see.

Read full topic

The website don’t make up for how shitty RS3 is.
[/quote]Shane you need to play it some more and try to learn about the story line. It seems that’s what Jagex is really pushing toward is more story line overall and trying to make an actual story.

I got on for about 2-3 hours last night it was pretty chill I guess. They are combatting bots decently now as well. There are still farmers out there but they will be handled with eventually… (true there will always be botters)[/quote]
I have not seen any botters since the release of RS3. Not even website spammers either.

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:23, topic:525882”]Oh and I heard the music and it reminds me of Star Wars.[/quote]RuneScape III: Revenge of the Sith

[quote=“Soulcist, post:23, topic:525882”]I do like how it looks now but I would of figured they would have changed the look of the forums (released all of the changes at once if they do redo the forums and whatever else matches the last theme) and the other various looks that matched with the entire-look of it before.[/quote]IIRC they are releasing the site bit by bit. I don’t quite know how long that will be though.

Read full topic

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I do like how it looks now but I would of figured they would have changed the look of the forums (released all of the changes at once if they do redo the forums and whatever else matches the last theme) and the other various looks that matched with the entire-look of it before.

Oh and I heard the music and it reminds me of Star Wars.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

hmm yeah now that I am loading it a lot more it does seem to be running a little faster. It isn’t a lot faster but it’s…more decent. Adventure log still takes forever for me.

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

The website looks good, the game isn’t.
The site actually runs faster for me than what It used to.(was dreadful)

item.title: New Site
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

The first few times the site was loading very slowly, but since i loaded the page 3-4 times the pictures have been saved on to the browser cache. Now it loads quick but they’ve got too many images on the homepage which annoys first time visitors because of slow loading speed.

Read full topic
